name: Plants Vs Zombies Vs Predator
description:
A frantic RTS about using your talent for botany to turn harmless Plant Matter into a lethal weapon, taking down swarms of zombies and getting back at your alien captors

This game, including the music was made by me in 10 days for 2018 Summer Awful Jam.

Unfortunately I did not make it clear enough that escape opens a pause menu. Press escape if you want to quit or open settings.
